overview: Rasty and her friends, Smitha, Debby, Marchel, Harry, and Dhana, try to make a video clip of her at a train station. While editing the video, they see a strange apparition in the footage. When they go back to the station to make a documentary, they start being haunted. They are advised to tear the shroud of a dead virgin and set the cloth on fire to stop the haunting. With a help of Fikri, a police officer, Feli and Sarah set off to find that piece of fabric, and bring it to a railway carriage that is said to be haunted.
title: A Virgin's Shroud
